source_note: State baseline derived from Oklahoma DEQ solid waste rules and major municipal recycling programs; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting and mulch operations are regulated under Oklahoma DEQ Solid Waste Management rules; backyard composting allowed without permit.
organics.bin: Green waste or compost drop-off bin where available.
organics.notes: Curbside organics collection offered only in select cities like Norman.
provenance: Oklahoma DEQ Solid Waste Management Rules

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.
paper_cardboard.notes: Greasy, waxed, or wet cardboard not accepted.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars (rinsed, lids removed).
glass_containers.bin: Glass-only drop-off sites; limited curbside service.
glass_containers.notes: Broken or non-container glass not accepted.
provenance: City of Tulsa glass recycling info

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum, steel, and tin cans (empty, rinsed).
metal_containers.notes: No large scrap metal or pressurized containers.

plastics.guidance: Recycle plastic bottles, jugs, and tubs labeled #1â€“#2; other types depend on local program.
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and foam are not accepted curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Oklahoma has no statewide container deposit or refund law.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle with local curbside or drop-off program.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries via HHW programs or drop-off sites.
household_batteries.bin: Take to hazardous waste or recycling center.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of regular trash and recycling bins.
provenance: Oklahoma DEQ Household Hazardous Waste Program

e_waste.guidance: Electronics can be recycled through local e-waste events and drop-offs; no statewide mandate.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste recycling facility or HHW event.
e_waste.notes: Accepted devices vary; check local listings.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film are not accepted in curbside recycling.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to participating retail stores for recycling.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Some local ordinances restrict single-use bags.
provenance: Oklahoma DEQ recycling contamination reduction info

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulky waste pickup or deliver items to transfer station/landfill.
bulky_items.notes: Fees or scheduled collection required in most cities.
